name: ppx
description: PPX是一款基于pywebview和PyInstaller框架，构建macOS和windows平台客户端的应用框架。本框架的视图层支持Vue、React、Angular、HTML中的任意一种，业务层采用本地Python+调用远程API。
author: 潘高 <pangao1990@qq.com>

scripts.init: pnpm add -D shx && pnpm run clean && pnpm prune  && pnpm prune -C ./gui && pnpm install && pnpm run initInstall
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf build gui/dist pyapp/pyenv pyapp/spec/macos* pyapp/spec/windows*
scripts.initInstall:macos: pnpm install -C ./gui && python3 -m venv pyapp/pyenv && ./pyapp/pyenv/bin/pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r ./pyapp/requirements.txt && ./pyapp/pyenv/bin/python ./pyapp/package/exe/getAppISSID.py
scripts.initInstall:windows: pnpm install -C .\gui && python -m venv pyapp\pyenv\pyenv && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r .\pyapp\requirements.txt && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\python .\pyapp\package\exe\getAppISSID.py
scripts.init:cef: shx rm -rf pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF && python -m venv pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r .\pyapp\requirements.txt && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple cefpython3
scripts.pre: shx rm -rf build && npm run build -C ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.pre:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-pre-cef
scripts.pre:folder: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf build && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre.spec
scripts.prefoldercefComments: 预打包-cef模式-文件夹模式
scripts.pre:folder:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-folder-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-folder-pre-cef
scripts.build: shx rm -rf build && npm run build -C ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.build:dmg: shx rm -rf build/*.dmg && python3 pyapp/package/dmg/getJson.py && appdmg pyapp/package/dmg/dmg.json build/setup.dmg && python3 pyapp/package/dmg/rename.py
scripts.build:exe: shx rm -rf build/*_Windows.exe && python pyapp\package\exe\getIss.py && pyapp\package\exe\InnoSetup6\ISCC.exe pyapp\package\exe\InnoSetup.iss
scripts.build:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-cef .\buildCEF\windows-cef
scripts.build:folder: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf build && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder.spec
scripts.buildfoldercefComments: 正式打包-cef模式-文件夹模式
scripts.build:folder:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build -C ./gui && .\pyapp\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-folder-cef .\buildCEF\windows-folder-cef
scripts.alembicComments: 迁移数据库，用法: m=信息备注 pnpm run alembic
scripts.alembic:macos: cd ./pyapp/db/ && ../pyenv/bin/alembic revision --autogenerate -m "${m}" && ../pyenv/bin/alembic upgrade head && ../pyenv/bin/alembic upgrade head --sql > ../../static/db/migration.sql && ../pyenv/bin/alembic current > ../../static/db/version
scripts.alembic:windows: cd ./pyapp/db/ && ..\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\alembic.exe revision --autogenerate -m "${m}" && ..\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\alembic.exe upgrade head && ..\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\alembic.exe upgrade head --sql > ..\..\static\db\migration.sql && ..\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\alembic.exe current > ..\..\static\db\version
